bibl.title: A Sahidic Coptic Manuscript in the Private Collection of Lloyd E. Cotsen (P. Cotsen 1) and the Limits of Papyrological Interpretation.
bibl.note: The parchment codex P. Cotsen-Princ. 1 (= LDAB 10855). - Introduction. - Descriptions and contents. - Interpretation. - Papyrological categories. - Identity of P. Cotsen 1 as a ""schoolbook"". - Bilingualism and P. Cotsen 1. - Concluding remarks.
bibl.seg: Scott Bucking, A Sahidic Coptic Manuscript in the Private Collection of Lloyd E. Cotsen (P. Cotsen 1) and the Limits of Papyrological Interpretation.
Journal of Coptic Studies 8 (2006) pp. 55-78 et pl. 12.

The parchment codex P. Cotsen-Princ. 1 (= LDAB 10855). - Introduction. - Descriptions and contents. - Interpretation. - Papyrological categories. - Identity of P. Cotsen 1 as a ""schoolbook"". - Bilingualism and P. Cotsen 1. - Concluding remarks.
